description: This file defines a multi-agent financial analysis system using classes such as Agent, Team, and various tools, with configuration for database connections, agents, team setup, and demo scenarios.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent with specific tools, memory, and instructions for tasks.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles database interactions for storing memories in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the memory component for agents, including models and database storage.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude language model for reasoning tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by agents.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions and data in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Defines a team of agents with shared tools, instructions, and storage.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Provides reasoning capabilities for agents within the team.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides tools for financial data retrieval and analysis.

methods.name: Memory
methods.description: Constructor for Memory object, configuring model, database, and memory management options.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for Agent objects, configuring name, role, model, tools, storage, and instructions.

methods.name: Team
methods.description: Constructor for Team objects, configuring team name, mode, model, members, tools, instructions, storage, and other options.
